early-development: Calystone is in early development, and we can't guarantee stability or full functionality at this stage.
empty: When you select an node on the outline, its details will show here.

errors.UNABLE_POST_CONTENT: Unable to save content to file

features.data-ownership-description: Your files, your control. No data tracking, no cloud storage. Everything stays on your machine.
features.description: An open-source self-management app built on your file system.
features.note-taking-description: Edit notes quickly, using the familiar structure you already organized on your directories and files.
features.title: Welcome to Calystone

fsa-not-supported: This app relies on a browser feature called the File System API. Although it's a web standard, it isn't supported by your current browser.
ignore-info: Use the input to list the patterns to ignore for files and folders. Each line represents a single glob pattern (e.g., "*.jpg" or "**/archive"). Any file or folder matching that pattern will be skipped recursively. This makes loading faster and keeps the outline uncluttered. For more information on crafting glob patterns, see this article about {0}.
name: name
not-loaded: Please, wait a moment while this node is loaded.
